text: Božidar Smiljanić (20 September 1936 – 7 April 2018) was a Croatian actor. He appeared in more than 70 movies from his career's beginning in 1953 until his retirement in 2016. He was born in Zagreb, Croatia. Smiljanić was known for his movies Journalist (1979), Transylvania 6-5000 (1985), Armour of God (1986), Project A Part II (1987), Armour of God II: Operation Condor (1991), First Class Thieves (2005), Ultimate Force (2005) and The Constitution (2016). Smiljanić died on 7 April 2018 in Zagreb at the age of 81.Preminuo veliki hrvatski glumac Božidar Smiljanić == References == == Other websites == * Category:1936 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Croatian movie actors Category:Actors from Zagreb
title: Božidar Smiljanić
